actions.recommendation: Supplement with vitamin D3 5000 iu daily for 4 months then recheck your level aiming for a level of 50 to 80 ng/ml. Once you are in this range you can decrease your supplement to 1000 to 2000 iu daily.

Your BMI and waist circumference are both significantly high. Weight around the abdomen is associated with an increased risk of chronic disease such as heart disease, type 2 diabetes and certain cancers. You want to aim for a waist circumference of 80cms or less. Continue with the dietary changes that you have made and try to start exercising.

A hsCRP level above 3 indicates high levels of inflammation and puts you into a high risk category for heart disease. Focus on eating an anti-inflammatory mediterranean style diet, losing weight around your abdomen, gentle exercise and stress management.

treatment_timeline.report_date: Report date from the data or 'Not specified'

actions.recommendation: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
